description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This
move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever
stat is higher for the user.

move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever
stat is higher for the user.

effect.shortEffect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
